<h3 id="X22770">X(22770) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd CIRCUMPERP TANGENTIAL TO 3rd EXTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^5-(b+c)*a^4-2*(b^2-b*c+c^2)*a^3+2*(b+c)*(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*a^2+(b^4+c^4-2*(b^2-5*b*c+c^2)*b*c)*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2-4*b*c+c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22770) = 3*X(3)-2*X(11248) = 3*X(381)-2*X(10526) = 2*X(5450)-3*X(11194) = 3*X(5603)-X(5758)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(22770) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {4,956}, {5,2551}, {8,3149}, {10,6918}, {63,12672}, {104,6361}, {106,15663}, {145,411}, {210,5780}, {219,945}, {347,7053}, {355,4847}, {381,10526}, {387,19543}, {388,6907}, {405,5603}, {442,10532}, {474,5657}, {495,6825}, {496,6827}, {515,12513}, {516,8666}, {518,6261}, {519,11500}, {529,6256}, {573,2256}, {580,1191}, {944,7580}, {946,958}, {952,6985}, {962,1012}, {993,4301}, {1001,13464}, {1006,10595}, {1044,9363}, {1056,6908}, {1058,6987}, {1108,1766}, {1259,11682}, {1260,5730}, {1376,11362}, {1457,7078}, {1478,15908}, {1479,11827}, {1498,2818}, {1532,3436}, {1537,11415}, {1597,1872}, {1621,5734}, {1630,20818}, {1656,19854}, {1657,5840}, {1699,5258}, {1702,19014}, {1703,19013}, {1836,22759}, {1902,22479}, {2800,12330}, {2802,22775}, {2817,9798}, {3086,6922}, {3421,6848}, {3427,5770}, {3555,18446}, {3560,5698}, {3600,6916}, {3617,6915}, {3622,6986}, {3651,7967}, {3654,16417}, {3656,16418}, {3820,6944}, {3889,18444}, {3897,20835}, {3913,6796}, {3927,5887}, {4299,11826}, {4423,9624}, {4679,18493}, {5220,20117}, {5251,11522}, {5288,5691}, {5450,11194}, {5687,6905}, {5690,6911}, {5721,19648}, {5763,5901}, {5795,7682}, {5886,11108}, {6001,22778}, {6600,22836}, {6601,6869}, {6737,11499}, {6831,10527}, {6834,17757}, {6836,10529}, {6842,9654}, {6850,18990}, {6865,14986}, {6868,15171}, {6889,10597}, {6891,15325}, {6893,7956}, {6909,20070}, {6923,9655}, {6925,20076}, {6927,7080}, {6928,9669}, {6932,20060}, {6936,10596}, {6962,10528}, {6980,11929}, {7330,9856}, {7491,9668}, {9911,22654}, {10531,11113}, {10599,17530}, {10609,12776}, {11230,16853}, {11231,16863}, {12197,22520}, {12331,13996}, {12497,22744}, {12520,12675}, {12645,18518}, {12670,12842}, {12671,12687}, {12696,22755}, {12697,22756}, {12698,22757}, {12699,22758}, {12701,22760}, {13329,15287}, {13912,22763}, {13975,22764}, {16293,19860}, {16410,19861}, {18761,22793}, {22761,22841}, {22762,22842}</p>
<p>
X(22770) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (382, 10525), (3913, 6796), (5763, 5901)<br>
X(22770) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 1482, 3295), (3, 8148, 10679), (3, 10247, 16202), (3, 10680, 999), (3, 12001, 10246), (36, 7991, 10310), (36, 10310, 3), (40, 56, 3), (65, 12704, 2095), (2077, 5204, 3), (3304, 5584, 3576), (7982, 11011, 1482), (7982, 11012, 55), (10902, 16200, 3303), (11012, 16204, 10267), (12702, 22765, 3)<br>
</p>
